name: Dương Hứa Toàn (Tony)
title: Full-stack Developer
summary: With 14 years working in the IT industry, also in charge of some positions from analyzing to developing, team managing, deploying system, I have a deep understanding about software architecture & SDLC, which enables me to learn new technologies fast and easily. And 90% of my working lifetime is for startups, so I would love to work in a result-oriented and innovative environment. And as the demand of a startup, I have to keep myself updated, and work professionally to deliver my best results to clients. Along with high-demanded fullstack environment, I have forged myself a self-teaching skill that enables me to be adaptive with a changeable and high demand environment.

working_history.about_project: Provide a tool for external EIPs to submit data into internal system. Be the first step to validate all the input all the external in notify all stakeholders.
main_responsibilities: Closely work with BA and QA team to provide system design before sprint start.
Maintain 6-year-old project without any upgrade to the latest tech stack.
Provide a plan and arrange resources for upcoming releases.
Be on-call support for partners when needed.
Support for every release schedule.
Tracing logs & support partners for production issues.
Write Engineer specs for new features.
Preparing the migration plan for integration with new system.
Propose an upgrade plan for all obsolete features.
Be Owner Engineer for every feature that team works on.
achievements_and_skills_gained: Redesign & improve the developer team workflow.
Improve leadership and team bonding skills.
Paid a lot of tech debt, restructured a lot of components to keep the code base more human-readable.
Enhance experience on upgrading an extremely obsolete system to the latest stack.
Researching skill in an environment that demands quick adaptation.
Consolidate knowledge with an enterprise system.
tech_stacks: Kibana with Elastic search for log

working_history.company: Grab - Project Grab Express on Web
working_history.about_project: Express Web is a Web portal that mainly focuses on Grab for Business, which needs a place to process a large number of orders every day. Provides tools like Shopify connect, Bulk Upload & Route Optimization for partners, Order tracing on Web.
main_responsibilities: Closely work with PO and QA team to provide system design before sprint start.
Be on-call support for stakeholders when needed.
Tracing logs & support team members whenever there is an issue.
Write Engineer specs for new features.
Be Owner Engineer for every feature that team works on.
achievements_and_skills_gained: Improve leadership and team bonding skills.
Paid a lot of tech debt that had been there for a long time.
Consolidate knowledge with an enterprise system.
Great experience of building up a team from zero.
Contribute to the raise of over 5% usage of Grab Express Web, consistently every month, peaking at 20% after Bulk Upload launch.
Researching skill in an environment that demands quick adaptation.
tech_stacks: Kibana with Elastic search for log

working_history.role: Tech Architect, Team Leader, Fullstack Engineer
working_history.about_project: A startup company, I play a role as a Foundation Team member. An E-learning platform that allows tutors to create classes and courses, either as group classes or 1-1. Linked with Stripe for online payment and easier for tutors to withdraw money. Provides a place for tutors to build their available calendar, booking physical places or virtual rooms.
main_responsibilities: Work as Developer and Team Leader.
Research and support team on their tasks.
Design Database & System architecture.
Solve problems when needed.
Monitor system health and resolve issues.
Develop members, organize seminars for guiding team on new approaches and technologies.
